duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the entire end to end payroll process, including guiding, training, and directing the payroll processing team, ensuring payrolls are processed accurately and timely.
Ensure standard operating procedures are clearly documented and detailed.
Partner with internal colleagues to support the most accurate and efficient way to process the payroll and ensure compliance regulations are completed and followed.
Gather T&A/payroll processing feedback and provide information and insight to Payroll Vendor Management.
Assess technology requirements and changes and ensure that systematic updates are completed by the vendor in a timely and complete manner.
Identify opportunities for and implement continuous process improvement and transformational projects.
Promote Pfizer purpose, values, and goals with proactive team management and ensure strong team engagement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Human Resources, or related field required with 3 years relevant experience (Master’s preferred)
